node.title: Embracing Brokenness
node.description: Although we all intellectually know that we each have our limitations, weaknesses, baggage from the past, and faults – in a word, brokenness – we often try to pass ourselves off as the exception to the rule. We live in denial, running and hiding from reality.  Join us as we explore the apostle Paul’s journey to brokenness, and how it became his calling card and the basis of his claim to spiritual authority.
